kpis.base_search:
`itsi_atlas_cp_oracle_database` sourcetype IN(oracle:session,oracle:connections)
| fields database_instance sourcetype STATUS connections
| eval active_connection = if(sourcetype="oracle:session" AND STATUS="ACTIVE", 1, 0)
| eval cached_connection = if(sourcetype="oracle:session" AND STATUS="CACHED", 1, 0)
| stats sum(active_connection) as active_connections sum(cached_connection) as cached_connections sum(connections) as total_connections by database_instance
| eval cached_connection_percent = round((cached_connections/total_connections)*100, 2)
| eval active_connection_percent = round((active_connections/total_connections)*100, 2)
| fields database_instance host cached_connection_percent active_connection_percent
kpis.description: Show percentage of active connections compared to total connections.
kpis.title: Active Connection%

kpis.base_search:
`itsi_atlas_cp_oracle_database` sourcetype IN(oracle:connections,oracle:pool:connections,oracle:session)
| fields host STATUS sourcetype connections connection_pool_used_percent
| eval active_connection = case(sourcetype="oracle:session" AND STATUS="ACTIVE", 1)
kpis.title: Active Connections

kpis.base_search:
`itsi_atlas_cp_oracle_database` sourcetype IN(oracle:sysPerf,oracle:instance,oracle:query)
| fields database_instance deadlock_rate instance_read_iops instance_write_iops transaction_rate STATUS response_time
| eval availability = case(sourcetype="oracle:instance" AND STATUS IN("OPEN","OPEN READ WRITE"), 1, 1=1, 0)
kpis.title: Availability
